title: Activision Winning With Battle Royale, Puerto Rico’s Small Businesses Hurting, Apple Event
itunes:title: Activision Winning With Battle Royale, Puerto Rico’s Small Businesses Hurting, Apple Event
description:
Matthew Kanterman, Bloomberg Intelligence Video Game Analyst, explains why a new game is lifting Activision Blizzard shares. Nick Leiber, Bloomberg Businessweek Contributor, discusses how Puerto Rico's small businesses are still hurting from Hurricane Maria. Steve Kroll, Managing Director at Monness, Crespi, Hardt & Co, and Mark Giambrone, Equity Portfolio Manager at Barrow Hanley, share their thoughts on the markets and China. Jon Erlichman, Anchor of BNN Bloomberg's The Open, previews Wednesday’s Apple products event. And we Drive to the Close of the market with Kara Murphy, CIO at United Capital Financial Advisers.   

 Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
